subject: Code is fast with JUnit but rediculously slow when run through its own main
msgSnippet: Hi All! I have code that is fast when I run it in my JUnit Test but ridiculously slow (about 10000 to 100000 times slower) when I run it through its own main.
messageBody:
Hi All!

I have code that is fast when I run it in my JUnit Test but
ridiculously slow (about 10000 to 100000 times slower) when I run it
through its own main.

We HAVE checked that -Xmx -Xss options are identical.

Any ideas?

Thanks in advance.

Morten
